content.rendered:
Directed by C.S. Amudhan.

Written by C.S. Amudhan. K. Chandru. Bharani Gopinath.

Cast Jiiva(Special appearance). Iswarya Menon(Ramya & Gayatri & Khalisi). Shiva(Shiva). Santhana Bharathi(Nakul). Manobala(Siddharth). Nizhalgal Ravi(Inspector Inbasekaran). Kasthuri(Item Dancer (as Kasturi)). Kalairani(Paati). R. Sundarajan(Bharath (as R. Sunder Rajan)). Ajay Ratnam(King Adhiyaman). Suja(P’s Hench Girl). Disha Pandey(Priya). O.A.K. Sunder(Wasim Khan (as Oak Sundar)). Rajkamal(Collector). Geetha(Debate Participant Ritika). Thendral(P’s Secretary). Nandini(P’s Secretary). Aaron Barber(Anderson (as Aron Barber)). Veena(P’s Secretary). Gerard Pio(Bodhidharmar). Surya(Theatre Manager). Jack(Cobbler). Shalini(P’s Secretary). Karthikeyan(P’s Henchman). Prakash(Taxi Driver). Jenipriya(HBO Reporter). Vairam(Debate Host). Soundarya(Tracking Girl). Rajkumar(Politician). Aditya(Nat Geo Reporter). Madeeh Khan(Osama). Chethan(Commissioner Yezhusaamy). Ansarutheen Mohiadeen(Raja Minister). Ramesh(Khalisi’s Groom). Olga Katlovyca(FBI Agent #5). Julia Crane(Angelina). Amine Chaalal(FBI Agent #2). Islem Salamo(FBI Agent #1). Manoj Khan(Dawood). Suresh(Inspector Siva Kumar). Mugilan(Poet In Adhiyaman’s Palace). Ramji(Advocate). Ryan Tadjou(FBI Agent #4). Mercy Jackson(FBI Agent #9). Vadim Churov(FBI Agent #3). Ahmad Sano(FBI Agent #7). Sanni Babaktundo(FBI Agent #6). Peter Pan(Kim Jong Un). Yuang Suang(Bride’s Father). Manju(Bride). Suman(Informer). Shridhar(Courier Boy). Jones(Tracking Police). Alabi Hanif(FBI Agent #8). Gorge Vijay(Constable Paramu). George(Constable Paramu). Satish(P)

Language Tamil.

Producers Chakravarthy Ramachandra. S. Sashikanth.

Production Y Not Music. Y Not Studios.
